column1: I guess Elon doesn't want to wait for #Election2020 and is advocating for the immediate #impeachment of #Trump? #CoronavirusLockdown #coronavirus

Sometimes it's more than just doing your job. Sometimes it's as simple as putting the life of another human being before your own. #Empathy #Compassion #Humanity #SelfSacrifice #Life #Death #MedicalStaff #Caretakers #coronavirus

Shouting at Trump is a lot like shouting at the TV...you need to write the network, the production company, the director(s) and the writers, as well. #RedressOfGrievances #Politics #America #economy #EconomicCrisis #coronavirus #CoronavirusResponse

Correction: The loss of thousands of lives is part of what that ego craves... ...it's an issue of both #power and #sadism. The formation of #Cult45 was so he could do these things to us, including his own followers. #Trump #TrumpLiesAmericansDie #coronavirus @sarahkendzior

Odd. If you were half this organized we would have neither a pandemic nor racial violence by white supremacists. But I guess you have more important things to do than your..............job? #Trump #protests #GeorgeFloydProtests #COVID19 #coronavirus
